CustomField.formula: IF((TEXT(GES_Meeting_Planner__c) == "Chambers, Brenda"),"bchambers@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Meeting_Planner__c) == "Wagner, Allyson"),"awagner@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Meeting_Planner__c) == "Travis, Brian"),"btravis@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Meeting_Planner__c) == "Caci, Marie"),"mcaci@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Meeting_Planner__c) == "Kramer, Maria"),"mkramer@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Meeting_Planner__c) == "Rogers, Kayla"),"krogers@ges.com"," "))))))
CustomField.label: GES Meeting Planner Email Formula
